item.title: Robotics Discovery for 2nd and 3rd Grades | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This class offers a progressive, hands-on introduction to robotics for students in grades 2 and 3, covering Vex GO, Lego Spike Essential, and Sphero Bolt Robotics throughout the academic year, while developing problem-solving, critical thinking, and teamwork skills.
